metadata.synopsis: Goblin listening to another goblin's stories. He is very drunk and should be slurring his words.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
0.text: You new 'ere? You look new. Strange... weird-like. For a goblin. 'S why you don't know, right?

2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
2.text: I'll tell you somethin', right? Just for you. Don't upset Crusher. He'll... you know... crush.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
1.text: Man, you're like... the best guy I ever met. You just... kicked 'im... like... kicked Crusher's arse.

7.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
7.text: It's a secret, right. 'Tween you and me. But I think... I think I like you better. But don't tell 'im.

3.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
3.text: You gotta... gotta listen to Crusher. 'E get's mad if you don't. MAD.

4.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
4.text: Didya see that? That one just... kicked 'im... like... kicked Crusher's arse.

12.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
12.text: It's a secret, right. 'Tween you and me. That... that was amazin'. But don't tell 'im I said that.

5.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
5.text: Bastards. Crusher'll set 'em right, I'll tell ya.
5.context: NodeContext: He thinks that what you did was gross, but he's also in awe.

6.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
6.text: Didya see that? Someone just got 'im... got Crusher to kiss 'is feet... foot.
6.context: NodeContext: He thinks that what you did was gross, but he's also in awe.

8.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
8.text: Someone kissed Crusher. Like... kissed 'is foot. That's gross. With lips and all. That's really gross.
8.context: NodeContext: He thinks that what you did was gross, but he's also in awe.

9.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
9.text: You kissed Crusher. Like... kissed 'is foot. That's gross. With lips and all. That's really gross.
9.context: NodeContext: He thinks that what you did was gross, but he's also in awe.

10.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
10.text: Don't - don't touch Crusher's boots. His boots are mine!
10.context: NodeContext: One of the strongest goblins has just died, but this goblin is very drunk, and he only cares about taking Crusher's boots.

11.speaker: Sharp-Eye Breg
11.text: Man, you're like... the best guy I ever met. Just got 'im... got Crusher to kiss yer feet... foot.
11.context: NodeContext: He thinks that what you did was gross, but he's also in awe.
